channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Great Leaders Sometimes Freeze in High-Stakes Moments
item.description: When you show up aligned with purpose and love, results follow.

item.title: Robinhood CEO says just like every company became a tech company, every company will become an AI company—but faster
item.description: "It'll be a helpful assistant to a trader and also to your broader financial life. But I think the humans will ultimately be calling the shots.”

item.title: Rubio says Trump is ‘not happy’ about Israel’s strike on U.S. ally Qatar targeting Hamas operatives
item.description: "The president was not happy about it. Now we need to move forward and figure out what comes next.”

item.title: Markets have been acting ‘super weird’ lately. Just look at gold prices vs. the dollar and bonds
item.description: "The fact that the 30-year Treasury yield didn’t fall immediately is weird and worrying. It took very weak payrolls to finally do that."

item.title: The Communication Habits That Quietly Drain Your Confidence
